_source.text: 668 - Apr 2011 - Marian Valley and Penrose Park: spiritual powerhouses , Br Barry Coldrey Marian Valley A few kilometres from the town of Canungra the official title of the Pauline Fathers property is the Shrine of Our Lady Help of Christians but the place is better known to Queensland Catholic s as Marian Valley.
